name: FiMFiction.net Background Recolorizer
description:
A port to Stylish of the FiMFiction.net Recolorizer Greasemonkey script by yrfoxtaur (plus enhancements).

This style allows you to set a custom site background on FiMFiction.net.

IMPORTANT: Click the "Advanced Style Settings" button to configure this.

user.name: ssokolow
user.about: Userstyles.org has a bug which keeps resetting my notification e-mail address. I strongly recommend using the contact form on my blog if you want me to notice. I also sometimes go into more detail about my userstyles on my blog. See the userstyle tag for a list of those.
